name: Ancient Marble Blitz
description:
Ancient Marble Blitz is a easy zumu style game.Chains of colored marbles are walking on the way to the hole.Your goal is to eliminate all the marbles before they fall into the hole.You'll get higher score if you make more combos.
Don't let the ball chain reach the end of the path.Fire colored balls as fast as you can!
How to play:
1.Tap the screen where you want to shoot.
2.Match 3 or more same color marbles to eliminate them.
3.Create Combos to cause chain reaction and earn more scores.
4.Clear out the entire chain.
